# anyOf(_:)

**Type Method**

Enforces that the string be one of the provided values.

## Declaration

```swift
static func anyOf(_ values: [String]) -> GenerationGuide<String>
```

## Getting the constant

- **constant(_:)**: Enforces that the string be precisely the given value.

items.description: Enforces that the string be precisely the given value.
items.name: constant(_:)
